detectors.description:
LuckyDoubler (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#11-191) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * (multiplier) / 100),false)) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#87)

detectors.description:
LuckyDoubler (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#11-191) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#89)
detectors.markdown:
[LuckyDoubler](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L11-L191) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1)](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L89)

detectors.description: LuckyDoubler.rand(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#127-133) uses a weak PRNG: "uint256((uint256(hashVal) / factor)) % max (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#132)"
LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#67-122) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#74)
LuckyDoubler.init() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#57-65) ignores return value by msg.sender.send(msg.value) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#60)
LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#67-122) ignores return value by owner.send(fees) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#119)
LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#67-122) ignores return value by theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#102)

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#137-139) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#138)

LuckyDoubler.changeFee(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#147-151) should emit an event for: 
	- fee = newFee (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#150)

LuckyDoubler.changeMultiplier(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#141-145) should emit an event for: 
	- multiplier = multi (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#144)

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address).newOwner (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#137) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#138)
Modifier LuckyDoubler.onlyowner() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#37) does not always execute _; or revert
detectors.markdown: Modifier [LuckyDoubler.onlyowner()](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L37) does not always execute _; or revert

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#67-122):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#74)
	- theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance -= payout (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#106)
	- theEntry.paid = true (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#103)
	- unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1] (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#109)
	- unpaidEntries.length -- (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#111)
	- users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++ (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#104)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LuckyDoubler.join()](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L67-L122):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000)](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L74)
	- [theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout)](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L102)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balance -= payout](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L106)
	- [theEntry.paid = true](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L103)
	- [unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1]](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L109)
	- [unpaidEntries.length --](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L111)
	- [users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L104)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#67-122):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100 (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#92)
	- entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * (multiplier) / 100),false)) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#87)
	- unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#89)
	- users[msg.sender].id = msg.sender (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#81)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits = 0 (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#82)
	- users[msg.sender].payoutsReceived = 0 (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#83)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits ++ (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#88)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LuckyDoubler.join()](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L67-L122):
	External calls:
	- [msg.sender.send(msg.value - 1000000000000000000)](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L92)
	- [entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * (multiplier) / 100),false))](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L87)
	- [unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1)](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L89)
	- [users[msg.sender].id = msg.sender](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L81)
	- [users[msg.sender].deposits = 0](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L82)
	- [users[msg.sender].payoutsReceived = 0](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L83)
	- [users[msg.sender].deposits ++](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler.sol#L88)
